name: Global uniques
unitUniques: [This Unit] gains the [Corrupted] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] gains the [Plague] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [Land] units> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>

[This Unit] gains the [Untainted] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <for [non-[Warp Invasion]] Civilizations>
